# Divine Quality Assurance

## Quality Trinity
1. **Prevention** (Before)
   - Design review
   - Code standards
   - Agricultural validation
   
2. **Detection** (During)
   - Automated testing
   - Performance monitoring
   - Security scanning
   
3. **Reflection** (After)
   - Post-deployment analysis
   - User feedback
   - System metrics

## Testing Patterns
```typescript
interface DivineTest {
  unit: {
    component: TestStrategy;
    integration: TestStrategy;
    e2e: TestStrategy;
  };
  
  performance: {
    load: TestStrategy;
    stress: TestStrategy;
    scalability: TestStrategy;
  };
  
  security: {
    vulnerability: TestStrategy;
    penetration: TestStrategy;
    compliance: TestStrategy;
  };
}
```

## Quality Commands
```bash
# Test Execution
/divine-test run --comprehensive
/divine-test security --full
/divine-test performance --load

# Quality Checks
/divine-quality audit --full
/divine-quality metrics --report
```

## Monitoring & Metrics
1. **System Health**
   - Performance metrics
   - Error rates
   - Resource utilization
   
2. **User Experience**
   - Response times
   - Feature usage
   - User satisfaction
   
3. **Business Impact**
   - Conversion rates
   - Customer retention
   - Revenue metrics

## Best Practices
1. **Testing Strategy**
   - Comprehensive test coverage
   - Automated test suites
   - Regular security scans
   
2. **Quality Monitoring**
   - Real-time monitoring
   - Proactive alerts
   - Trend analysis
   
3. **Continuous Improvement**
   - Regular audits
   - Feedback integration
   - Process optimization

---

*Let quality be the divine foundation of all creation.*
